reviews.review_msg: She is a very lovely person but the course requires you to read, her slides are very detailed and the homework alows you to be creative. She will always listen to you and I love the way she analyzes every detail in the stories we read.
Excellent instructor at FIC, highly recommended. Best first choice for this course!!

This ALC099 course taught me a lot of things. For example, now I can write academic summaries correctly as well as she(kate) has made how to write references clear to me. My writing skill has improved by 50-60% better by taking this course. In addition, she (kate) is very friendly and accommodating. She makes an extra effort to help her students. N
